skins.shipDescription: Fletcher-class destroyer ¨C Hazelwood, Hull Number DD-531.
skins.selfIntroduction: I have a lot of experience on the battlefield, so I guess I'm a bit of a veteran! Oh right, I also served as a "reserve aviation command ship" for a while! What's that, you ask? Well, that'd be a ship that helps carriers guide their planes! Something like that~
skins.acquisition: Gotcha! Hehe, I'm Hazelwood, from the Fletcher class! Pleased to meet you!
skins.login: Right on time~! I just finished warming up~ Let's get going!
skins.details: Phew! That feels great! The warm sunshine feels amazing today!
skins.secretaryIdle1: These sunburns are battle scars from my active lifestyle!
skins.secretaryIdle2: Hey Bush, stop loafing around and come jog with me!
skins.secretaryIdle3: If only we could host a port-wide sports meet... I know I'd be the fastest one out of all my sisters!
skins.secretaryTouch: How about it? I've got a super healthy tan, right? Commander, show me ours~
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Eek! Don't go peeking under there!
